title: The Woman in Red: A Foreign Liaison in Vienna
description:
Is she seducing meâ€”or surveilling me?
A chance encounter in a Vienna coffee shop leads to a serendipitous meeting in a stuck elevator and sparks fly.Macau-born May is magnetic, mysterious, and seems to say all the right things to Jessa, an American intelligence officer stationed in the city. For bisexual Jessa, the allure is undeniable, but something about May feels almost too perfect.In the enchanting streets of Vienna, where passion and danger intertwine, Jessa's training warns her that fate might not be what it seems. Intelligence protocol demands she report this connection if it goes beyond a single night, but when May arrives at her door late on the day they met, Jessa decides to take the risk.Is May just an enchanting stranger, or is she playing a game far more dangerous?In this sultry tale of seduction and espionage, a night of passion quickly spirals into a tangled web of secrets, forcing Jessa to question where loyalty ends and desire begins.
author: Blythe Townsend
